sponsor: Alliance for Clinical Trials in Oncology
briefTitle: Armodafinil in Reducing Cancer-Related Fatigue in Patients With High Grade Glioma
officialTitle: A Phase III Randomized, Double-Blind Placebo Controlled Study of Armodafinil (NuvigilÂ®) To Reduce Cancer-Related Fatigue in Patients With High Grade Glioma
summary: This randomized phase III trial studies armodafinil to see how well it works in reducing cancer-related fatigue in patients with high grade glioma. Armodafinil may help relieve fatigue in patients with high grade glioma.

primaryOutcome.measure: The Number of Participants With a Response in Terms of a Clinically Meaningful Improvement in Patient-reported Fatigue at 8 Weeks.
